mapper.select: select id id, menu_id menuId, menu_name menuName, parent_id parentId, menu_url menuUrl, available from menu_info ORDER BY id ASC

select m.m_id mId, m.role_id roleId, m.manager_account managerAccount, m.real_name realName, m.add_time addTime, m.is_lock isLock, m.add_man addMan, m.balance balance, m.is_delete isDelete from manager m left join role_info r on m.role_id = r.role_id ORDER BY m.m_id ASC
